thread.title: Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, and More Stars Read Mean Tweets at the Oscars
thread.title_full: Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, and More Stars Read Mean Tweets at the Oscars

title: Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, and More Stars Read Mean Tweets at the Oscars
text:
By Kristina Rodulfo Feb 26, 2017 During tonight's Oscars, host Jimmy Kimmel did another edition of his Mean Tweets series, featuring nominees like Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, Natalie Portman, and Lin-Manuel Miranda. Other stars included were Whoopi Goldberg, Samuel L. Jackson, Felicity Jones, and Eddie Redmayne. #watchNwinOnStarMovies Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, Natalie Portman and more star in Mean Tweets: #Oscars hilarious!!! pic.twitter.com/Zj6JRydg22 
— Firoz Saifi (@SaifiFiroz) February 27, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below They were all pretty hilarious–but a highlight was definitely Tilda Swinton, who read a tweet about her being compared to a dog with an uncanny resemblance to her: Dead.
